FieldOptionDBField
public interface field_option_field
extends db_field

Client-side remote interface to the FieldOptionDBField class.

resetOptions

ReturnVal resetOptions()
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException

Resets the options in this FieldOptionDBField to the empty set. Used by non-interactive clients to reset the SyncPrefEnum values to a known state before setting options.

Returns null on success, or a failure-coded ReturnVal on permissions failure.

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

setOption

ReturnVal setOption(short baseID,
                    short fieldID,
                    SyncPrefEnum option)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException

Sets the SyncPrefEnum for this matrix for base <baseID>, field <fieldID> to <option>.

This operation will fail if this field option field is not associated with a currently checked-out-for-editing FieldOptionDBField.

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
